summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.description: I turn technology into profitable products that grow fast and solve real business problems.
summary.experience: I have +7 years of experience building results in software, digital products, and project management, with a track record of +40 high-impact deliveries, 8 teams led, and 5 scaled projects.
achievements: I structured a software house from scratch and delivered +10 custom digital solutions, impacting revenue and client expansion.
I led agile team transformation, eliminating bottlenecks and increasing delivery speed by 42%.
I led system integrations in a pharmaceutical group and generated product rollouts that accelerated sales by +15%.
I scaled a national e-commerce with resilient architecture, doubling the active user base in less than 1 year.
